text: Dancing With the Stars has resumed its nationwide Live! Light Up the Night tour after one of its tour buses was involved in a fatal multi - vehicle pile - up in Iowa, E! News reports. The cast took the stage at Coronado Performing Arts Center in Rockford, Illinois on Tuesday, one day after the bus was involved in a 19 - vehicle crash that killed a 21 - year - old woman and injured four others. As a result, the tour's stop in Ames, Iowa was canceled for that night, People reported. On Tuesday, the show, which features stars and pros from the ABC series, resumed in Illinois. ` ` They made an announcement at the beginning that the performance would be a little different, but you could hardly tell,'' one attendee said.
